name: Cozy Cottage Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease an 8-inch cake pan.
Cream butter and sugar until fluffy.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well, then stir in vanilla.
Whisk together dry ingredients and alternate adding with milk.
Pour into pan and bake for 28–32 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
